main_text:
Theoretical Options for Natural Law Theorists
2. Theoretical Options for Natural Law Theorists

Even within the constraints set by the theses that constitute the
paradigmatic natural law position, there are a number of variations
possible in the view. Here we will consider several issues that must
be addressed by every particular natural law view, and some
difficulties that arise for possible responses to these issues.
section_title: 2. Theoretical Options for Natural Law Theorists
entry_title: The Natural Law Tradition in Ethics
